discourse_list.title: Beta mirror uniswap for new user

content.content: I found that there are lots of new users don’t know how to use uniswap; so I build a mirror beta one base on Ropsten, www.betaswap.org, to help them; I have met some question when I build the betaswap website; If who can help me, please get in touch with me. thanks a lot;
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining their proposal of creating a beta mirror of Uniswap for new users. They are also asking for help with some questions they have encountered while building the website. A 3rd party could provide constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
